Package ibis.rmi.registry

This is the Registry for the Ibis RMI implementation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Registry A Registry is a remote interface to a remote-object registry.
 

Class Summary
LocateRegistry The LocateRegistry class is a container class for methods that are used to obtain a reference to a remote registry or to create a registry.
 

Package ibis.rmi.registry Description

This is the Registry for the Ibis RMI implementation.
